display_name: Filtered: Obstructive/Mixed Apnea Index 4% or arousal
description: Obstructive / Mixed Apnea Index With Arousals at 4% desat  [(Total number of obstructive apneas with aroual associated with >= 4% desat+ Total number of mixed apneas with arousal associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 + marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa) / slpprdp
